name: Shuffle
additionalCredits: supercarotte for Pokemon Shuffle Save Editor

events.name: Pikachu Celebration
events.longDesc: Simulate check-in 10 times every month for a year, to unlock all 12 Pikachu Celebration.

events.name: Reset Limited Shop
events.longDesc: Reset the number of times you can exchange Jewels for specials items.

notes: Without special stages, max is 566 pokemon (rank 22)

list.name: Event Simulator
list.desc: Found in the Savefile (.sav) Utilities section in this page
